name: Mat Long: A Kampung RPG
description:
December 1941,

Somewhere  at an unknown region of Peninsular Malaya (under the British rule during that time) lies a little 'Kampung' (village) where its community lived a slow, peaceful, and quiet life. 

However, there are rumours spreading here and there about an upcoming invasion, said to be powerful enough to usurp the British rule. If there's an invasion there will be war, and that's the last thing the people of the village wanted to hear.

But enough talk about war, Those are for grown-ups!
Follow Mat Long, a clueless kampung boy, and his group of friends as they do what kampung kids do best:
Play around, helping others, go fishing, fight monkeys (wait what?) 
in this friendly RPG about the simple life of the kampung folks of Malaya.

Credits:
Made in - RPG Maker MV
Plugins used - Galv_Shadow Darken - galvs-scripts.com
                             - SpeedManager - Karberus
                             - YEP_EventChasePlayer - http://yanfly.moe/yep/

Music- The Frontier (Original album by Wolfman Sachs, copyright free)-https://www.youtube.com/c/WolfmanSachs/playlists

Disclaimer:
Although this game was made based on historical events that actually happened in Malaya, in-game events, characters, place and location are all purely fictional. Any affiliations to reality are merely coincidential.
